snippet: Ivars Kalvins, the inventor of the banned drug meldonium, insisted on Friday that it was safe and questioned whether the authorities were justified in listing it as a performance enhancer.
abstract: Meldonium, recently banned by World Anti-Doping Agency, is defended by its inventor, who insists it does not have performance enhancing effects; issues regarding use of meldonium by athletes highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Ivars Kalvins, the inventor of the banned drug meldonium, insisted on Friday that it was safe and questioned whether the authorities were justified in listing it as a performance enhancer.
